text: -dindra#mEqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvainaqM BUti#M gamayatiq Bava#tyEqva ya(gm) sUqtvA vaqSA syAt tamaiqndramEqvA&&* la#BEtaiqtadvAva tadi#ndriqya(gm) sAqkShAdEqvEndriqyamava# rundha aindrAqgnaM pu#naruth sRuqShTamA la#BEtaq ya A tRuqtIyAqt puru#ShAqth sOmaqM na pibEqd-vicCi#nnOq vA Eqtasya# sOmapIqthO yO brA$hmaqNaH sannA - [  ]  33
